title: Cabinet expands to 19 with 6 more Ministers
body_lines: The Cabinet has been expanded to 19 with the appointment of eight more Ministers by President Gotabaya today.
Among the appointees today were those who were sworn in with different portfolios last week.
Ramesh Pathirana - Industries in addition to the Ministry of Plantation.
On Friday the President appointed nine new Cabinet Ministers and earlier this month four were appointed.
